items.label: Cloud Developer
items.subtitle: HP
description: Designed, developed, and delivered cloud-based services interfacing with multiple platforms and organizations across HP.
Architected and implemented containerized cloud native full-stack software solutions to enable automated data processing.
Implemented reverse proxies, task queuing, distributed multitasking, and asynchronous monitoring to improve system scalability.

items.label: Software Engineering Intern
items.subtitle: Air-Weigh
description: Maintained a SaaS solution built with Java (Spring), JavaScript, MySQL, Apache Tomcat, and AWS.
Developed a microservices prototype consisting of an API built in Python (Flask), a PostgreSQL database, and a front-end built with React & Redux.
Designed and developed a full-stack cloud application using Python (Django), JavaScript (React, Material-UI), MySQL, and AWS.

items.label: Software Engineering Intern
items.subtitle: TDS Telecommunications
description: Developed ETL pipelines using Python and SQL for network diagnostics and capacity reporting.
Rewrote legacy Perl, shell, and SQL code into scalable, maintainable Python scripts.
